columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The Unix epoch timestamp in seconds for when the cluster was created.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The Kubernetes server version for the cluster.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The endpoint for your Kubernetes API server.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that provides permissions for the Kubernetes control plane to make calls to AWS API operations on your behalf.

columns.name: encryption_config
columns.description: The encryption configuration for the cluster.

columns.name: resources_vpc_config
columns.description: The VPC configuration used by the cluster control plane.

columns.name: kubernetes_network_config
columns.description: The Kubernetes network configuration for the cluster.

columns.name: logging
columns.description: The logging configuration for the cluster.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity provider information for the cluster.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the cluster.

columns.name: platform_version
columns.description: The platform version of your Amazon EKS cluster.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the table
